## Documentation Issue
What documentation needs to be improved or fixed?

## Issue Type
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Outdated content

- [ ] API documentation incomplete

Please specify where the issue is located:
- **File**: [e.g., README.md, packages/core/README.md]
- **Section**: [e.g., Installation, API Reference, Examples]
